name: Winter Grae
description:
Winter Grae
A FMV Game About Discovering Deleted Videos That Reveal a Deadly Mystery about actress Winter Grae.

Winter Grae is a FMV game that provides you access to previously deleted video clips recovered by hackers you hire. The revealed videos cover years of interviews, social media video posts, private cell phone recordings, webcams, security camera footage, and much more.
What happened to Winter Grae? Will you survive after you find out the truth or perish with the secret?

How does it work?
Winter Grae is an interactive thriller, merging both film and game play.
You are in the shoes of an avid fan of the famous Winter Grae. Your obsession is a former child actor who became famous as an adult in the early days of social media. All of her videos were scrubbed from the internet by the authorities under court order. Hire hackers on the dark web to recover deleted Winter Grae videos found on various servers around the world. Each sever has different pieces of the story so select carefully.

  • Select which servers to have hackers retrieve footage from.
  • Review all the pieces to the mystery, explore the conspiracy, see the truth.
  • Multiple Paths To Select, with different endings.
  • See your relationship status with multiple characters.
  • Multiple playthroughs will reveal other video selections to interact with.

Make key choices
Make meaningful decisions that have an effect on how the story plays out. Choose how you interact with other characters, and shape your relationships with them. Your decisions will determine if you live to share the truth to the world or die with the truth of what happened to Winter Grae.
